comments:
Description:
Dataset issue in attached report.

Steps to reproduce:
Attached is an old report created following below steps.
1.Add a data source.
Driver:net.sourceforge.jtds.jdbc.Driver (v1.1)
URL:jdbc:jtds:sqlserver://spmdb/gui
User:sa
Password:sa
2. new a data set named "dSet"
3. In the query tab of the windows 'Edit data set'  input : "" select *
from dbo.Trans a , dbo.Account b  
where a.account_id = b.account_id
      and a.account_id = ?"""
4. In the parameters tab of the windows 'Edit data set', new a parameter set:Param_a ,Ingeter, Input,3;
5. click the 'Preview results' tab in the windows
6. Drag the dataset to Layout and preview

Expected result:
Output columns list in Dataset Edit dialog is correct.
Preview result is ok.

Actual result:
1. Output column list in Dataset Edit dialog only showed "account_id_7" but I can see several columns when preview results.
2. EngineException when preview the report.
Error.ScriptEvaluationError ( 1 time(s) )
detail : org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.api.EngineException: There are errors evaluating script "row["COLUMN_10"]". at You could use "Refresh" to retrieve the current cachedMetaData if there is something wrong in data explorer. And since the old report design cannot be found, we cannot found whether there is something wrong in backward compatibility.
